mapper.sql: a.id, a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.address, a.avatar, a.description, a.email, a.mobile, a.nick_name AS "nickName", a.password, a.sex, a.status, a.type, a.username, a.office_id AS "officeId", a.street, a.pass_strength AS "passStrength"

select from sys_user a where a.mobile=#{mobile}
select from sys_user a where a.email=#{email}

select from sys_user a where a.office_id=#{officeId}
